alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 1:57PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Yuma and Maricopa Counties through 245 PM MST... At 157 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station to near Sentinel to 8 miles southeast of Dateland. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goodyear, Buckeye, Gila Bend, Palo Verde, Painted Rock Dam, Perryville, Sentinel, Cotton Center, Liberty, Estrella Mountain Ranch, Hassayampa and Arlington. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 121 and 126. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 75 and 112. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 129 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
